At Cloud9linens, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you visit our website or make a purchase from our store.


Information We Collect:


When you visit our website, we automatically collect certain information about your device, including your IP address, browser type, and operating system. We also collect information about your browsing behavior on our site, such as the pages you visit and the links you click. When you make a purchase from our store, we collect personal information such as your name, email address, shipping address, and payment details. We use this information to process your order and provide you with the products and services you requested.


How We Use Your Information:


We use the information we collect to improve our website and provide a personalized experience for our customers.


We may use your information to:


Process and fulfill your orders Communicate with you about your orders and provide customer support Send you promotional offers and updates about our products and servicesImprove our website and optimize your browsing experienceAnalyze customer behavior and preferences to enhance our marketing strategies Prevent fraudulent activity and ensure the security of our website and customers.


How We Protect Your Information:


We take appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. We use industry-standard encryption technology to safeguard your data during transmission.


Sharing Your Information:


We may share your personal information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, and providing services to you. These service providers are obligated to keep your information confidential and use it only for the purposes specified by us. We may also share your information when required by law or to protect our rights, property, or safety, as well as the rights, property, and safety of our customers or others.


Your Choices:


You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can update your account information by logging into your account on our website. If you wish to delete your account or have any other privacy-related concerns, please contact us using the information provided below.
